snippet.title: Hasbro's Battleship on Nintendo Switch
snippet.description:
BATTLESHIP, the ultimate board game classic is coming to Nintendo Switch. Man your battle stations and use your tactical skills to sink your enemy’s ships before they sink yours!

Nintendo eShop US: https://www.nintendo.com/games/detail/battleship-switch/

Follow Marmalade Game Studio:
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/MarmaladeGameStudio/
Twitter: https://twitter.com/MarmaladeGames
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/marmaladegames/

Stay faithful to the original and play in Classic Mode, or deploy swift airstrikes and fire torpedos to surprise your enemies in Commanders Mode. Play alone, with your friends and family in your living room or online in the cross-platform multiplayer.
